page.title: 07JACKIE JONES IN CLATFORD
page.content: The alarm went off and up I got to wash,clean my teeth and brush my hair before getting dressed ready for breakfast.While having breakfast I talk to my dad and collect my bus fare so I can get home from {SCHOOL} in { {GOODWORTH CLATFORD.}I arrive at school with my friend Clare.We have different lessons as part of our{EDUCATION,}some are maths,English and nature.At 11-50 we have dinner,I hope it is cheese and lentil flan--my favourite.In the afternoon we have {SPORT,}I like netball.At 3-25 we catch the bus home and I am always hungry so we have our tea as soon as dad arrives home.After tea dad goes to play badminton,so Clare,Tara and I go swimming at the Sports Centre for an hour.Dad collects us to go home,we are tired,a little supper and off to bed.
